description.displayText:
Nancy is one of the nicest people you will ever meet.  She watched my boys after school for a year and our neighbors would call me up to share their appreciation that Nancy would lead outside activities for the neighborhood of kids.  Our neighbors would hire her on the weekends and she became very popular.

Nancy was always happy to help with special requests for homework or the kids dinner.  We could count on her to be on time and she was often available for extra hours on the weekends as well.
description.originalText:
Nancy is one of the nicest people you will ever meet.  She watched my boys after school for a year and our neighbors would call me up to share their appreciation that Nancy would lead outside activities for the neighborhood of kids.  Our neighbors would hire her on the weekends and she became very popular.

Nancy was always happy to help with special requests for homework or the kids dinner.  We could count on her to be on time and she was often available for extra hours on the weekends as well.
